title: Bringing Light to the Future
description:
Watch as we unravel the magic behind our latest project for ‘Light,’ a TV program that illuminates the path of construction and innovation. Witness the power of visual effects as buildings reconstruct in a breathtaking reverse destruction sequence. Dive into the VFX breakdown by Blendbox Studio, where imagination meets reality.
.
BlendBox Studio
Post-production company
https://www.blendboxstudio.com/
.
AllOver group

.
